name: The Morph Code
description:
A 2.5D puzzle platformer cyberpunk styled game.

Your phone's storage space is running out, which is a bad sign as it will slow down the device. So you play as the code which runs the whole place. Your goal is explore the map which is the insides of your phone. Look for the trash data and destroy them. Find and collect all the big chunky files and take them to CPU which will automatically process it further. 

Controls:

W & Spacebar - Jump

A & D - Movement

Left Shift - Dash

E - Interact

Esc - Pause

Up & Down Arrow key - Control Elevator
